alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Iberia and west central St. Martin Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Loreauville, or near St. Martinville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Loreauville and Lake Fausse Pointe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
